title: Metrication: managing the change over
creator_credit: Charles Pascoe, Tony Matthews and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Attempts to show how a company changeover to the metric system can be planned and implemented in order to minimise costs and maximise benefits. Indicates the type of senior management decisions required following the initial tasks survey and discusses how metrication should be implemented, timed and monitored in relation to cost effectiveness.
